items.title: UK Approves Targeted Therapy for Cervical Cancer

items.title: FDA OKs Blood-Based Test to Help Diagnose Prostate Cancer
items.description: Premarket approval means IsoPSA testing can now be done at certified labs nationwide. Medscape Medical News

items.title: Step Counts May Signal Early Signs of Parkinson's Disease
items.description: Low daily step counts predict Parkinson's disease years before diagnosis but are likely a sign of early disease, not a risk factor. Medscape News UK
